resources.string: "Capricorn system resource app Copyright © 2014 – 2019 F. Leins. Version: "
Capricorn will not collect personal data. Data are collected only to display in the app or the widgets and furthermore not stored permanently and not forwarded to any third party.
Capricorn has been carefully developed. The publisher assumes no liability for damages that are caused or created by the direct or indirect use of Capricorn.
This app contains Open Source Software. Many thanks to all involved people for creation of the software. The following overview shows the license information for Capricorn.
